messages.subject: speaking of beating people down
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/27/02 3:17:17 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/27/02 3:17:17 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< You don't want to go there to defend unschooling.
He told them to leave their wives and families. >>

I could very well be wrong here, and I know I'll be corrected shortly if I
am....
but wasn't it mothers and families he asked them to leave?
And only those that were called to apostleship, not everyone?

Could be wrong, I need to check.
I'm not using the Bible as support for unschooling....just trying to get
people to really think about the hypocrisy in bashing unschooling and
non-spankers when there ARE examples that fit (along with a lot that doesn't)

Ren
